title: The Myths of shoplifting
creator_credit: M T I Teleprograms, Churchill Films, Frank Jacoby, Doris Storm and Doug Jacoby
brief_description: The increased incidence of shoplifting has meant increasingly sophisticated security and surveillance systems are installed in retail stores. The popular myths about shoplifting are examined and negated. This film contains six vignettes emphasising that shoplifting is a real crime with real consequences. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
